entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port au Choix
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 11:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: SW 25 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
